name: LXQt File Archiver
summary: File Archiver for the LXQt Desktop
description:
LXQt Archiver is an archive manager for the LXQt environment. It allows you to: * Create and modify archives. * View the content of an archive. * View a file contained in an archive. * Extract files from the archive.

LXQt Archiver supports the following formats: * Tar (.tar) archives, including those compressed with gzip (.tar.gz, .tgz), bzip (.tar.bz, .tbz), bzip2 (.tar.bz2, .tbz2), compress (.tar.Z, .taz), lzip (.tar.lz, .tlz), lzop (.tar.lzo, .tzo), lzma (.tar.lzma) and xz (.tar.xz) * Zip archives (.zip) * Jar archives (.jar, .ear, .war) * 7z archives (.7z) * iso9660 CD images (.iso) * Lha archives (.lzh) * Single files compressed with gzip (.gz), bzip (.bz), bzip2 (.bz2), compress (.Z), lzip (.lz), lzop (.lzo), lzma (.lzma) and xz (.xz)

LXQt Archiver doesn't perform archive operations by itself, but relies on standard tools for this.

This package contain the LXQt archiver.
